name: Watch
description: A narrative driven puzzle platformer. It has a unique use of perspective, combined with "Fez-like" ability to change your view, results in an unusual platform puzzle-solving experience. On top of that, with a bizarre narrative, the story becomes a great mystery to uncover.

name: Haven
description: Two lovers gave up everything and escaped to a lost planet to be together. Glide through a mysterious landscape, explore a fragmented world and fight against what’s trying to tear them apart in this RPG adventure about love, rebellion, and freedom.

name: Nine Witches: Family Disruption
description: When an occult German WW2 division releases an ancient curse upon the world, a supernatural problem is going to require a supernatural solution. Take control of two playable heroes as they embark on a comedic, alternate-history adventure with a truly original story (99.9999% guaranteed).

name: Phogs!
description:
In Phogs! you play as a duo of dogs on a captivating, puzzle-filled adventure. Linked by a stretchy belly, you’ll need to bark, bite and bounce your way through obstacles set across the themed worlds of Food, Sleep and Play, in co-op or single-player.

Forage through Food World, teeming with tasty treats. From hot buttered toast to chopped celery... even a river of chocolate!

Stroll through Sleep World, complete with teddy bears, cushions and quilts, all nestled in the glow of the soothing night-light.

Pounce through the crazy toybox of Play World, exploring a beach amusement park, a retro arcade, and everything in between. Woof!

Supporting single-player and shared-controller gameplay, plus local and online co-op, Red and Blue are always ready to play!

name: Creeper World 4
description: The fourth installment of the real-time strategy series again tasks the player with containing the creeper, a destructive fluidlike substance, slowly overtaking the map's surface. Creeper World 4 continues the series' gameplay and favors 3D environments with a focus on fluid dynamics over traditional 2D graphics.

name: Claws & Feathers III
description: The birds and cats are back in an all-new puzzle adventure that sends them soaring across the galaxy in search of a new home! When a zombie apocalypse ravages their home planet, the birds set off for the stars. But they're not alone!

name: El Hijo: A Wild West Tale
description:
El Hijo is a spaghetti western, indie stealth game.
The game is set in a mythical place of the 19th century that very much resembles the American west, as we know it from Sergio Leone‘s westerns, taking some of its most popular characteristics of outlaw gangs, saloons, cunning, sarcasm, irony, etc. There is no indication of a specific time, or place. It could be everywhere and anywhere.

You guide 6-year old boy El Hijo on his quest to find his father, by escaping a monastery, fighting his way through the desert and avoiding monstrous creatures, and outsmarting horrible gangsters in the saloon of a villain town.

name: A Letter to Luna
description: A short rhythm game created for a mini game jam. Use the power of music to send your letter! Score well enough and you might even get something back.

name: Yarn
description: In Yarn you control the character by using just a single button. Avoid the traps, collect the stars and stomp on the zombie cats to complete each level. This version of the game is a PICO-8 demake of the iOS game Yarn.

name: American Truck Simulator: Freightliner Cascadia
description: Now it is finally your chance to experience America’s most popular Class 8 truck for yourself! The long-awaited Freightliner Cascadia for American Truck Simulator is finally here, and is available in a wide variety of configurations including 12 chassis variants, 14 engine choices, 13 transmissions, 4 different cabin types, 4 interior trim options and loads of other customization options. Whatever journey you have in mind, there will be a Cascadia ready for the job!

name: Yume Otoshi
description: Yume Otoshi is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You explore dreams of Yumesogi (ゆめそぎ) and collect effects in her dream world.

name: Teasing Master Takagi-san VR: 2nd Semester
description: Virtually experience the playful and relentless teasing of heroine, Takagi-san, in Teasing Master Takagi-san VR: 2nd Semester. Go heads up in poker with Takagi-san, go fishing together, and more!

name: Her Sign
description: The former janitor of a space station returns to Earth on a recruitment mission.

name: Winter Magic
description: a lonely girl moves into a witch town and meets a cool witch~

name: SoulCalibur VI: Hwang
description: Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new playable character: Hwang!

name: House of God
description: As The House of God races towards heaven, Jack blasts their way to the conductor in this chaotic and fast-paced Rogue-Lite.

name: Hybrid Warrior
description: Sin descripción

name: 100 Hidden Birds
description: Hidden object game in the cartoon city style. Ultra hard! Really very difficult!

name: Box Cats Puzzle
description: This is a puzzle game. A lot of cute cats want to enter a box, you need to help them~！

name: Mahjong Worlds
description: Mahjong Worlds is a recreation of the classic mahjong solitaire in the 3D. The game features classic and 3D levels (formations) in beautiful and relaxing scenes.

name: Tiny Strife
description: Tiny Strife is a roguelike turn-based combat game. Control up to three heroes as you advance through the debris of a planet destroyed by Shub'Guth and confront his minions.

name: Wet Steps
description: Have a relationship with a charming priestess! An urban fantasy short and brisk visual novel with elements of slavic mythology.

name: Zinuru the Great
description: A remarkable Action Sci-Fi adventure game.

name: Marble Parkour
description: Roll, boost be fast and avoid traps in this challenging marble parkour game. Make level records, collect achievements and finish challenging tracks

name: Girls on puzzle 2
description: Girls on puzzle 2 is a puzzle - type puzzle game for adults. In the game, you need to collect a full-fledged image from small pieces that are randomly scattered across the screen

name: Biscuitts 2
description: Biscuitts 2 is a punishing jumping game. With practice, you'll be able to jump, but explore with care; a single missed jump could lead to a long fall back down.

name: Hanami
description: HANAMI is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Trials of Argolis
description: Every year daring warriors and fighters from all across the land travel to the province of Argolis to partake in a sacred trial of strength and endurance.

name: Pebble Witch
description: Play as a witch. Talk to pebbles. Reflect on the melancholy of becoming. Sit more. Walk. More walking. Have a crush on your burly teacher. Enjoy a lovely day in an Australian beach town.

name: 100 Hidden Gnomes
description: Hidden object game in a fairytale style. This is a kind game for kids.

name: Chroma Quaternion
description: A JRPG around four kingdoms, colored by the seasons! Make use of up to three roles per character to enjoy the variety in skills, effects and even costumes in turn-based battles.

name: Buster's Quest: Trials of Hamsterdam
description: Buster's Quest is a classic action-puzzle game focused on solving increasingly complex puzzles. Play as Buster or Busterina as you traverse lands filled with cute cuddly enemies determined to stop you at all costs. Collect hamsterballs, shoot enemies and get the fastest times as you climb the online leaderboards. Learn enemy quirks to quickly vanquish them and progress to the next level. With over 150 levels, the challenge to save your significant other has never been so daunting.

name: WonShot
description: Like the name implies in wonShot you get ONE shot. One shot each level to find the perfect spot to fire your laser and blow up as many enemy ships as you possibly can. Create massive chain reactions with numerous types of bombs, ships, and environmental hazards to utterly annihilate the rebel fleet. Be careful though, you need to reach a minimum score per level or you WILL be terminated.

name: Das Balkonzimmer
description:
Discover the balcony room in a completely new 3D world.
Move with your unique character.
Discover the expanse of the balcony room, its facets and niches.
Shoot with your weapon and move objects through the game's physics!
Fling them off the balcony or across the room, whatever you want!
You can experience the game in first person as well as in third person, depending on your wishes.

name: Interview With the Whisperer
description: A short game about a journalist who travels into the Galician countryside to interview an old man who claims to have built a radio that allows him to speak with God.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 2 - Season 5
description: Chapter 2: Season 5, also known as Season 15, is the fifteenth season in Fortnite: Battle Royale that started on December 2nd, 2020 and is set to finish on March 15th, 2021. Its theme revolves around The Zero Point and bounty hunters with the slogan “Join the Hunt” and the title Zero Point.

name: Sam & Max: Save the World
description: The Freelance Police are back in a remastered version of their first season of episodic adventure games, lovingly updated by a small group of the original developers with the blessing of Sam & Max creator Steve Purcell.

name: Black Desert Online: Prestige Edition
description: Black Desert is a revolutionary MMORPG that delivers intense, fast-paced combat, life activities, and an expansive open world. Made with Pearl Abyss’ proprietary game engine, Black Desert provides state-of-the-art graphics with spectacular sceneries, realistic environments, and sophisticated details. In addition to that, the insane level of customization allows you to edit everything from height, torso, face, skin texture, to micro-level details, making it possible to create your own unique characters for any of 19 classes currently available in the game.

name: Self-Isolation
description: This game is a simulation of self-isolation. You need to support your family, not to lose your job and finally not to go crazy.

name: Blask 2
description: Blask 2 is a unique puzzle game where you control the environment in order to hit all the goal markers with lasers. More levels more mechanics more fun!

name: Immortals Fenyx Rising
description:
From the creators of Assassin’s Creed Odyssey comes a storybook adventure about a forgotten hero on a quest to save the Greek gods.

Embark on a journey to the Isle of the Blessed, taken over by dangerous creatures of mythology. Prove your legendary heroism by taking on their leader, Typhon, the deadliest monster in all of mythology in a face-off for the ages.
Explore a beautiful fantasy world where tricky puzzles, mysterious dungeons and heroic feats await. The journey will be as challenging and rewarding as the final destination.
Will you be the Hero of the legends foretold?

name: Forge and Fight
description: You're a gladiator blacksmith. Forge absurd makeshift weapons and wield them in gladiatorial combat!

name: Oniria Crimes
description:
Jacob has disappeared.
Explore his cute voxel room to find out what happened.
Each of its objects has a story to tell.

name: Poorgirl
description:
A rhythm tap game to play with a poor girl, Kokeshi, who is goot at dancing!
A bonus game will occur if normal play is successful! You can get a lot of money.
Play a lot and aim for a millionaire!

name: Touhou Flower Fight
description:
Create Your Own Party!

Combine numerous characters and cards to create your own party.
You can freely mix and match them to create the optimal team,
and the tactics and play style of your party will be determined by your choices.

name: Hot Wheels: Laptop Infantil
description: Sin descripción

name: What Lies Behind
description: Small metal/runic level. Comes with a custom music track from Quake64. The map source is included.

name: Cradle
description: Around medium-sized blue brick level.

name: Winter Festive 2020: Advent CalenDoor
description: Sin descripción

name: The 12 Days of Doomas!
description: Snow is falling, reindeer are flying, arch-viles are doing that bubbly gurgle noise thing they do, and the fourth installment of the Pineapple Under the Sea Monthly Speedmapping Series has left a very nice gift under a tree near you! 15 uniquely wrapped 10 sectored gifts are here and waiting for you to rip and tear open this Doommas! Unfortunately for you, there are also 75 arch-viles under the tree. Guess you shouldn't have been such a naughty kid this year, huh.

name: The Magnificent Five
description:
This time around the story goes that while you were out hunting game in the prairie an old nemesis of yours "Black Hand Burt" murdered your wife & daughter, and robbed you of your fortune. Now you're on a path of Revenge! Your goal is to kill Burt & all of his men for what they did.

The Magnificent FIVE is a limit-removing Doom 2 mapset lead by your favorite space shark & containing contributions from FIVE members of Doomer Boards, containing FIVE maps, with only FIVE weapons to choose from.

name: Super Mario and the Grand Star
description:
'Super Mario and the Grand Star' is a ROM hack of Super Mario 64 with a total of 116 stars to collect.

Bowser and his minions have gone to war with the Mushroom Kingdom, though the tides of the war are constantly shifting.
To help shift the war in his direction, Bowser travels to the Moon in search of a prophesied ancient relic known as the Grand Star.
The situation goes from bad to worse when Bowser awakens Khonsu, one of the last surviving members of an alien civilization.
Khonsu seems to think the people of Earth killed his people many years ago, and vows to destroy the Earth to get revenge.
It's now up to Mario to save the world from Khonsu!

This game is set to take place after the events of Super Mario 64 and shortly before the events of Super Mario Sunshine.

name: Empire of Sin: Deluxe Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Electronic Uno
description: Sin descripción

name: Fish RPG
description: Fish RPG borrows gameplay elements from The Walking Fish, a game the pioneered the world of fish gaming.

name: Hello Kitty Tamagotchi
description: The Hello Kitty Tamagotchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model, and a collaboration between Tamagotchi and Sanrio's Hello Kitty brand.

name: Ell's Kitchen
description:
Ever wanted to be the host of an online cooking show?

Here's your chance to experience the joys of cooking for an audience.

Play as Elliot, our chef and host of the not-yet-popular youtube series: Ell's Kitchen, as she cooks her friend's favourite foods in her girlfriend's kitchen.

name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Alternate UniverZ
description: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Alternate UniverZ is a PvZ2 mod that aims to revamp PvZ2 vanilla with nostalgic changes such as PvZ1 progression and the return of 25 sun meta, along with extra content and mechanics. Its difficulty is targeted towards more casual players and slowly accelerates as the game progresses, but there is extra content for experienced players as well!

name: SoulCalibur VI: Character Creation Set F
description: Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new Character Creation set!

name: Pokémon Go: Season of Celebration
description: The first implementation of seasons intersected with the Winter season in Northern Hemisphere and Summer season in the Southern Hemisphere. It intersected with the GO Beyond update which added Kalos Pokémon, Levels 41 to 50. A theme of this season is celebrating Pokémon from all regions with events focused on each of them. The event will end with a brand new global event experience as the 25th anniversary of Pokémon approaches

name: Game Gear Micro White
description: A special edition of the Game Gear Micro included in the Aleste Collection: Game Gear Micro Limited Edition.

name: Fallen London: The Icarian Cup
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for December, 2020.

name: The Small Christmas Game
description: Are you ready to get in the right mood for Christmas? Find some Christmas snacks, put on your favorite Christmas music and play The Small Christmas Game! A cute and fun fetch game to get you in the right mood for Christmas.

name: Empire of Sin: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Trust Me, I Got This!
description: This is a short game in which you're kindly asked to fix everything in the room. That should be easy! Based on real-life events.

name: Santa Olympics
description: Santa gets in shape by competing in 6 fun one-touch mini-games that will require precision and quick reflexes.

name: Doka-fli
description: Game that takes place in the credits of the Game Gear Micro White, made for the Sega Master System/Sega Mark III by M2. It is a simple game where you destroy the credits of the staff that worked on the game and the GG Micro White/Aleste collection by bouncing a spaceship among them. Released on December 24, 2020 inside the Game Gear Micro White, and in extremely limited quantities for the Sega Master System.

name: Age of ILCoin VR: Retribution
description: Age of ILCoin VR: Retribution is a virtual reality game set in a futuristic sci-fi action setting where the ultimate treasure is ILCoins (ILCs). You will become “The Miner” and your mission will be to earn and protect your coins from the space aliens pirates.

name: Quantum Origination
description: Explore over 28 3d dreams, as you traverse the Chronoverse to remember your dreams.

name: Dead by Daylight: A Binding of Kin Chapter
description: A Binding of Kin is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, The Twins and a Survivor, Élodie Rakoto. Purchasing the add-on will unlock its new Killer, its new Survivor, and an exclusive item for the survivor.

name: Elite Commander
description: You are a well trained elite member of special weapons and tactics teams.

name: Park the Car
description: Park the car is a racing game where you need to park your cars in a safe location!

name: Party Parkade
description: Party Parkade is a local couch multiplayer game where players compete against each other to score points by parking cars. While colliding into your friends and environment, frantically looking for spots, and experiencing power-ups, the game is guaranteed to spark chaotic entertainment in your homes!

name: Lou's Revenge + One Dog Story Bundle
description:
Lou's Revenge is the first satirical action-RPG in which you can play Lou, Satan's son! Drink milk, kill the traitors, save Hell and rescue the hottest demoness from the clutches of those nasty people and mega-corporations!

One Dog Story is an engaging pixel adventure game with RPG elements, gameplay that'll get you hooked for hours. You wake up in an underground laboratory, free again after a horrific accident. Prepare to explore this expansive game world and its many secrets and mysteries.

name: HardCube + Mystery Mine Bundle
description:
HardCube is an arcade platformer for all fans of hardcore games.
Mystery Mine. Dangerous monsters and bosses, arcane magic and decisions on which many lives depend! Can the ordinary aborigine save the world?

name: 2048 Colorful
description: Sin descripción

name: Hot Hentai Puzzle Vol.1
description: HOT HENTAI PUZZLE VOL.1 is a puzzle game for adults, where your goal is to put all the pieces together to reveal a HENTAI image and relax with original and handmade arts.

name: Wordle 4
description: Wordle 4 is a new format puzzle game from the Wordle series. 29 new categories scattered across the English alphabet from A to Z.

name: Puzzling Peaks EXE
description: A charming, possibly spooky, story-rich physics puzzle game. You'll need quick reflexes, brainpower, and unconditional trust in your quirky artificially intelligent guide to succeed.

name: Demon Heart
description: Take a sit on a cosy coach in the woods. Have a conversation with a beings older than a world itself. In Demon heart you will know where demons live, what a human can do to them and the most important: how their hearts taste.

name: Batterneers
description: Batterneers is a multiplayer, pirate ship fighting game! Compete in the arena with your friends, using a range of unique cannons, powerups, bombs and effects.

name: Smart Thief
description: Smart Thief is a 3rd person theft simulator where you are in the role of an amateur robber who steals every night from differents houses/markets.

name: Simp Attack
description: Play as your favorite Waifu and try and defeat the never ending waves of Simps coming your way, how long can you last?

name: Mana Maker
description: Magic is a wonderful thing, so why not make more? In Mana Maker, your goal is to make mana so you can conjure minions to do it for you! Once you conjure Cthulhu you may ascend and unlock even more possibilities!

name: Hypercide
description: Destroy humanity! Harvest their souls! Level up your minions! Conquer over 70 major cities! Hypercide is a casual strategy game where you send your monsters to earth to wipe out humanity.

name: Genius At Work!
description: Test your intelligence and creativity! With Genius At Work you will have your construction area where you can let your imagination fly and carry out your technical projects.

name: Don't Stop Corocco
description: Sin descripción

name: AOD: Art of Defense
description: AOD is a new gameplay in the traditional tower defence genre. You must protect your base from waves of approaching enemies. Build and improve your towers and units and destroy your enemies in any way you can. Don't be weak, destroy them all, show who's in charge!

name: Block Motion
description: Block motion is a puzzle / design game where you place functional blocks to design a working factory. Build your design, press play and watch your factory in action. You have the freedom to solve the challenges any way you want; The only limit is your imagination.

name: Javols VR
description: Discover in Lozère, Javols, the capital of ancient Gévaudan completely reconstituted in Virtual reality

name: SPL: Skilled Pilots Live
description: SPL is a genre mix of fast paced looter shooter, souls-like and 3D space sim, with realistic physics dogfights.

name: Tripp
description:
Tripp uses the power of VR, beautiful imagery, sound frequencies, and mindfulness elements to help you feel calm and focused.
Tripp encourages daily use to support a regular mindfulness practice, which can help you reduce stress and build the resilience you need to stay healthy inside and out.

name: Bard Harder!
description: BARD HARDER! is a tabletop-inspired visual novel game about saving your friends from the Big Bad Evil Guy by using your strongest weapon: romance! So brush up on your pick-up lines and prepare some sexy tunes…what’s the worst that could happen?

name: Empire of Sin: Premium Edition
description: The Premium Edition grants access to all Deluxe Edition content plus two post-launch expansions and the stylish Al Capone’s Fur Coat costume.

name: Empire of Sin: Deluxe Edition
description: Empire of Sin: Deluxe Edition includes the Mobster Pack, Golden Weapon Set, and the Curb Stomp Execution kill animation.

name: Prehistoric Hunt
description:
Prehistoric Hunt is a multiplayer or single player dinosaur hunting game with a contract system to kill or put to sleep dinosaurs which allows players to earn more experience and money than just hunting.

Once the contracts are completed, they must be validated at camps present on the map just waiting to be discovered. It's at these camps that you can buy your equipment for your hunting sessions (weapons, ammunition, medikits, energy packs, ...). Boxes of equipment can also be looted on the map

name: Fallout 76: Brotherhood Recruitment Bundle
description: Join the new Brotherhood of Steel chapter in Appalachia and unlock bonus in-game digital themed cosmetic and C.A.M.P. items, including the Brotherhood Scouting Tower, Tactical Field Pack and more!

name: The Madvent Calendar
description:
A Merry and Scary Collection of 24 weird and spooky games to play over the course of December. It's an advent calendar you can play, every day!
The Madvent series began in 2020 and has continued ever year, put together by the HauntedPS1 Community!

name: Dandelions
description: a short narrative game for the vextro fall 2020 game jam

name: Pokémon Unbound
description: Welcome to the Borrius Region, a region rich in history. Many years ago the Borrius region fought a brutal war with the Kalos region. The people of the Borrius region summoned a dark force to help them defeat their enemies; however, the war ended in defeat when the king of the Kalos region unleashed the ultimate weapon. With the war over, the dark force was sealed away never to be used again. Many years later, an organization known simply as “The Shadows” seems bent on releasing the dark force once again. It’s up to you to stop them and save the Borrius region from ultimate destruction.

name: You're Not a Rogue
description: You're not a rogue, and your rogue isn't here. Still gotta open that door!

name: Fallout 76: Steel Dawn - Deluxe Edition
description: Steel Dawn is the first chapter in the new Brotherhood of Steel questline, free for Fallout 76 players. Paladin Leila Rahmani and her troops have arrived from California to establish a new Appalachian chapter. Join in their mission to rebuild society and aid in securing valuable technology - but only you can determine how it will be used. Includes the full game and bonus Brotherhood Recruitment Bundle in-game items.

name: Super Jetpak DX
description: Super Jetpak DX is an updated version of the freeware homebrew game JetPak DX. Which in turn is a is an homage to the ZX Spectrum game Jetpac.

name: Shelter War
description: Build and upgrade your shelter, craft weapons and sophisticated devices, fight freaky raiders, creepy zombies, surreal hypermutants, and other post-apocalyptic monsters. Plunder other players' shelters in the name of survival!

name: SuperStar FNC
description: A mobile rhythm card-collecting game developed by Dalcom Soft and FNC Entertainment, entertainment company behind some of K-pop's biggest stars, including F.T. Island, CNBLUE, SF9, AOA, Cherry Bullet, N.Flying, and more!

name: Summerland
description: Summerland is a first-person narrative game about morality and the afterlife. You take control of Matthew, a detective reliving the events of his past, being questioned on his morals along the way. In every door lies another memory, and every memory unlocks another door.

name: Ruff Night at the Gallery
description:
Ruff Night At The Gallery is an adorable short-form horror game where you explore an art gallery. Alone. At night. Sound scary? Don’t worry, the paintings are of cute dogs! But maybe DO worry because they’re also haunted…

Collect the keys to make it through each exhibit, but make sure to keep an eye on the artwork: the paintings like to move around. Ghost dogs will also pop off their canvases when you’re not looking to give you a big ol’ lick.

These dogs ain’t your grandpa’s poker playing kitsch - they’re works from the greats, from renaissance classics like “Pup With A Tasty Bone” and Paw Vinci’s “The Doggo Lisa” to modern masterpieces like “American Dogthic”, “The Howl”, Pawcasso’s “Pup Before A Mirror” - this gallery has something for everyone! (except cats)

name: Brain Meltdown: Into Despair
description: Brain Meltdown - Into Despair is a platformer game with a unique concept, where you need to control two characters by yourself. (This is not a co-op game!)

name: Coof Attack
description:
Defend your toilet paper from an ever-growing angry mob! Even the odds by teaming up with friends in up to 4-player co-op. 
Customise your character's appearance and skills to fit your play-style. 
Discover more as you progress and unlock even cooler stuff.

name: Hoser Hockey
description: Retro arcade hockey! Create your own teams and challenge your friends or the AI in fast paced shinny action. Play Hoser Hockey with up to eight players both locally and online.

name: Delta0
description: Delta0: A puzzle game to stimulate your brain!

name: Space Invaders Forever
description:
Back again - arcade legend and icon of gaming history! Lighting the fuse for a gaming revolution. Space Invaders is surely one of the most famous video games of all time and was the launching pad for the video gaming revolution. The game mechanics and its design make it a game that encompasses all the very best.

The following games are part of the Space Invader Forever Collection:
- Space Invaders Extreme
- Space Invaders Gigamax 4 SE
- Arkanoid vs. Space Invaders

name: EndlessShinyBlues
description: In an ordinary spring afternoon, the rebellious teenager broke into a quiet corner of the busy city. It was as if Asuka picked up a grain from countless sea sands—the teenager who skipped school and the big sister who skipped class met.

name: Football Manager 2021 Touch
description: Slick football management for managers seeking the fast-track to footballing glory. FM21 Touch is the time-saving alternative to the desktop classic, focusing on just the managerial essentials – tactics and transfers. It’s speedier seasons all the way to the top.

name: Chronos: Before the Ashes
description:
Chronos: Before the Ashes is an atmospheric RPG that chronicles a hero's lifelong quest to save their homeland from a great evil. Grow wiser, stronger and more powerful as you explore the depths of the mysterious labyrinth. But beware, the labyrinth takes a heavy toll - each time your hero dies, they lose a year of their life!

Every time the player dies they age one year. Player’s must adapt to their advancing age as they progress their character; starting the game young, nimble and quick, and ending wise and more attuned to magic.

name: Worms Rumble
description: Welcome to Worms Rumble, the first ever Worms game to feature real-time combat! Dive into epic 32-player Battle Royale and Deathmatch modes with full multi-platform cross-play as you fight to be the last worm standing!

name: Age of Rust
description: Age of Rust is a dark sci-fi action adventure game set in the vast expanse of the universe. You'll explore abandoned space stations, mysterious caverns, and ruins on far away worlds. On the way, you'll unlock puzzles with blockchain rewards and secrets to light the way forward.

name: Cookie Invaders
description: Cookie Invaders combines the classic space shooter action with rogue-lite and strategic ARPG elements where you fight your way through legions of evil cookies, empower your weapons by a massive skill tree and fight epic boss fights.

name: Truck Parking Simulator
description: Discover your skills to park a trailer.

name: Wing of Misadventure
description: Wing of Misadventure is the definitive Massive Multiplayer Online RPG experience created on RPG Maker, featuring a unique art style, carefully crafted loot system and fast paced combat style, making it the perfect match for hardcore and casual gamers alike!

name: Twin Mirror
description:
Twin Mirror is a psychological thriller wrapped around an investigation where your memories, choices, and relationships will determine Sam's complicated fate.
In Twin Mirror, every decision you make alters the course of your investigation, as well as your relationships in Basswood. Trust others or rely only on yourself in your hunt for the truth. But no matter your choices, your story is yours.
Take a look in the mirror - what will you see?

name: Subway Train Simulator 2D
description: Become a subway train operator and explore the whole metro system of the city. Transport impatient passengers, repaint and upgrade your trains, learn real signaling system, enjoy realistic sounds, and discover 89 stations on more than 100 miles of underground, overground, and underwater rails.

name: Project Wingman
description: Project Wingman is an independently developed combat flight action game to be released on PC with an emphasis on fun and refined gameplay, true-to-its-roots inspirations, and an engaging single player experience. Perfect for those who aren't looking for a simulator experience with the ease of pick up and play, all the way to those who want a fast-paced challenging flight action game.

name: Afterlands
description: Afterlands is a 10 Level Single-Player Hub which is a sequel to Cyrgoth's Revenge. While being Single-Player oriented, Afterlands can also be played in Co-op and Deathmatch modes, however due to the large map sizes, the latter is discouraged. Like in it's predecessors, there are numerous unmarked secrets throughout the span of the Hub, as well as two secret levels, one you can access early in the game, and another that is accessible towards the end of the WAD.

name: Unhallowed
description:
This was meant to be a map of a much larger map pack, but I've decided to focus on another big project instead of focusing on making 1-hour long maps after the other, which was burning me out a little bit.

This is not my style of map usually, I just felt like doing something pretty Sunder-y for once to see if I can manage a grander scale of map without a hitch.

name: Nightmare
description: Nightmare is a dystopian FPS where you take control of a Machinangel to incinerate hordes of synthetic demons. Leverage the power of time control, nuclear fission and demonic seals to ascend to digital heaven.

name: Dodonpachi True Death exA Label
description: Dodonpachi True Death exA Label is an expanded arcade-exclusive rerelease of Dodonpachi Saidaioujou. It features the original arcade and arrange modes from the Xbox 360 version, with their HD graphics display, alongside a brand-new "exA Label" mode. This new mode features rebalanced gameplay and heightened risk/reward via a reworked hyper shot system.

name: Clusterduck
description: Clusterduck is about hatching as many ducks as possible. As more ducks hatch, the more strange things happen. The ducks begin to genetically mutate! With each generation of ducks that hatch, the chances of things going horribly wrong increase at an alarming rate. Ever seen a duck with a sword for a head, or horse hoof for a wing?

name: Reminiscence in the Night
description: Reminiscence in the Night is an interactive visual novel focused on the theme of lost memories and how our daily choices can help us cope with them.

name: Finger Breaker
description: Can you hold down 2 or 3 buttons at the same time, easily ? And what about 5, 8, 11, even with a time limit. Try it in this simple game.

name: Fox in the Woods
description: A crafting base survival casual game play. Two playable game modes! Hand drawn vector images and animations. Support a small local game design team!

name: Ronister Adventure
description: Horrible creatures ravaged the entire autumn, taking their sacred fruits to other lands. Now Ronister goes out on an adventure around the world, facing various enemies and obstacles. On his journey he'll find vehicles and will get unique abilities to save our planet from the terrible Evil Bat.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator: Deluxe Edition
description: Build and expand your repair service empire in this incredibly detailed and highly realistic simulation game, where attention to car detail is astonishing. Find classic, unique cars in the new Barn Find module and Junkyard module.

name: My New Memories
description: Memories...One of the most important things in our lives. But what happens if you forget who you are? If you don't remember anything? Then you can only hope that the people that do know who you are help you out...This is your journey...On your way to finding new memories...

name: Funtime with Buffy
description: Things are not going so well since you've been left alone in the house. Your friendly plushie toy, Buffy, is not so friendly anymore. Otherwise he's haunting you all along.

name: Relic Splatter
description: Relic Splatter is an action-adventure game where you play as Rebecca Ciler, treasure hunter at the Relic Splatter Inc. Your goal is to find all the gold relics in each chamber with the use of your paintball gun. By coloring the walls you can spot secret passages and hidden relics. If you are a true collector there are also 2 secret red relics in each level.

name: Last Contingency
description: Last Contingency is a post-apocalyptic survival game pushing survival to it's brink! start on the outer banks of a deserted island in hopes to move inland & find better loot! join a team or be a lone wolf either way keep a sharp eye or you might find yourself alone on the outer banks once again!

name: Hello From Darkness
description: Hello From Darkness - a meme horror, made in 3D graphics with a first-person view. The action takes place in a gloomy city where everything has gone crazy. To win, you need to collect the necessary items, complete some tasks and just survive.

name: Algebra Ridge
description: Ready to save the world with the power of math? Find out in this unique story-driven adventure! In Algebra Ridge, you must stop Big Cheesy from stealing the Pencil of Knowledge!

name: Urban Basketball VR
description: Want to practise your Basketball technique? Have fun into a rich urban scenario, full of interactives elements. Let’s start training your shoot following tutorial steps, then start playing and score points. Try to make the best score to stay at the top of the leaderboard!

name: Rise of the samurai in VR
description: During the Warring States Period in Japan, the Tokugawa Shogunate levied heavily and aggressively. So a young Ronin fled Kyoto, and came to North China.

name: A.V.I
description: Explore the halls of a decrepit mansion and discover it's horrifying secrets from the lens of a missing man's smartphone, revealing his fate and the fate of the family that populated this ominous manor.

name: Poly Race
description: We try to continue on the road without hitting the vehicles around us.

name: Day of Vaccination
description: Day of Vaccination is a rogue lite action game in which you make your way through the city to stop the evil doctor. In the battle for your city you can unlock 16 different characters and choose between many different weapons. You have to explore the area and search through houses and shops.

name: Tomatomare
description: Sin descripción

name: Darkanoid
description: The Black Zone is a place where Arkanoid fans will truly be tested. Here you will find pain, heartache, and merciless Bosses.

name: Chickens on the Road
description: All the chickens escaped from the pen. Collect as many of them as possible. Avoid collisions with oncoming cars.

name: Pink
description: Pink is a mini pixel horror game about a girl trapped in her apartment.

name: Football Manager 2021: Xbox Edition
description:
Football Manager 2021 Xbox Edition brings the depth, detail, and drama of the world’s favorite football management simulation series to Xbox.
FM21 Xbox is a tailored for console experience based on Football Manager Touch and lets you make your mark on the footballing world, turn wonder kids into world beaters and win the biggest trophies in the game.

Take control of your football club and play the beautiful game your way. With more than 2,500 clubs from 117 leagues and 52 nations at your fingertips, you’re spoilt for choice. Will you choose to take an underdog to the top or jump straight in at a club accustomed to success? The choice is yours.

Fully optimized for victory with the Xbox Controller on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One, you can effortlessly put yourself on the path to footballing greatness with a version of the Touch UI that has been tailored for Xbox consoles and makes navigating through the game world a breeze.

name: Pixross
description: Over 150 relaxing nonogram logic puzzles featuring additional challenges and unlockable customizations!

name: The Tides of Time
description: The Tides of Time is an Action-Adventure-RPG with a time-loop mechanic. Sail the oceans and explore the islands of a mysterious world. You are Charlie, a young farmer, who is the only one able to solve the strange things happening at the Day of the Red Sun. Help the villagers, fight bosses and maybe you can save the world from an unknown threat.

name: Get Ogre It
description:
Play as Gobby, a small ogre who has been cursed and turned into a human by an mediocre alchemist and goes horrible wrong, the curse randomly transforms Gobby between human and ogre. Gobby must learn to manage his curse to pass between enemy troops and face his fears if he hopes to go back home as a normal little ogre.

Enter ever changing dungeons full of creatures and soldiers, depending on your race you will make friends or foes. Play your way as you find a way to undone the curse.

name: Mrs. Santa's Gift Hunt
description:
Christmas themed RPG. 
 
This game is a colectathon where you aim to get a high score that's awarded by doing various things in the game, including gathering presents.

name: VxVigilantes
description:
From stopping thugs to overthrowing a secret society, join Control and his team and lead them to success in turn based tactical combats.

Follow the journey of the Vigilantes initiative as they try to uncover the truth behind the disappearances of various gifted individuals.

name: Tetra Online
description:
Tetra Online was a fast-paced puzzle stacker. The game required quick reflexes, with the ability to adapt to situations being essential. There were many modes to play, including singleplayer and multiplayer modes.

Originally launched as a free-to-play Steam game, Tetra Online, as it was called, was taken offline due to a DMCA notice filed by The Tetris Company on December 9, 2020. The latest source code and binary were made available through GitHub, as development was officially ceased on the project.

name: Fox face kills!
description: A man in a fox mask invades the abandoned city to help girls from a mysterious phenomenon called “Wolf.” This is a stealth action game where you hide from the wolves on every stage. You then use gimmicks to defeat the enemy and proceed.

name: Nigel's Journey: A Working Day
description: Nigel's office building is under attack. Get him out of there using his military skills. Leave nothing and no one behind.

name: Heavy load
description: HEAVY LOAD is a puzzle in which you have to solve the problem of how to move the boxes so that they fall into the right places.

name: Akashicverse: Malicious Wake
description: It is a 2D Sci-Fi Action Shoot 'em up that can use command deadly techniques like fighting games. In this title, you can destroy enemies by using 10 distinctive special moves, "Methods", in addition to normal shooting attacks.

name: In Retrospect
description: Are you prepared to travel back into your memories and tell me about your life, in retrospect? Craft your own story and gameplay based on which collectibles you focus on! Health, wealth, love, education, creativity, or spirituality? What direction will your life take?

name: Empire of Sin
description:
Empire of Sin, the strategy game from Romero Games and Paradox Interactive, puts you at the heart of the ruthless criminal underworld of 1920s Prohibition-era Chicago.

It’s up to you to hustle, charm and intimidate your way to the top of the pile and do whatever it takes to stay there. This character-driven, noir-inspired game puts players smack dab in the glitz and glamor of the roaring 20s, all while working behind the scenes in the gritty underbelly of organized crime.

name: Wolflord - Online Werewolf
description: Is your friend a bloodthirsty werewolf? Is your neighbor a demon from the eternal abyss? Band together in the small town and unmask the evil characters before everything is lost.

name: Pokemon R.O.W.E.
description: Pokemon ROM hack made with the objective of being an open world version of Hoenn with a lot of Quality of Life changes to make team building easy without having to breed for anything and a lot of replay value with a lot of modes that changes how you play the game and what kind of team you can use to beat the league since all the Pokémon are obtainable from the start so you can try any team you can think of, there are also a lot of features from future games like Wondertrade, Following Pokémon, Updated mechanics up to Gen 8, etc.

name: Super Action Hero
description:
Super Action Hero: Stick Fight is an epic action mobile game with simple controls.

Tap the Stickman to defeat enemies and learn skills to upgrade the Stickman!

Welcome to the supreme playground of stick figures! Become a totally amazing superhero duelist and save the world!

name: The Mountains of Insanity
description: Large level with a secret military research base in the mountains built on top of a runic/metal dungeon. It is based on the Progs_dump mod (included) and comes with a few modified models and a custom skybox. The map and QC sources are included.

name: Auto Puzzle Defense
description: Real-time Battle with Auto Puzzle. Original take to the classic merge tower defense genre.

name: Fight // Flight
description:
Earth Year 2952: the corsair crew of the Oblivion spaceship gets attacked by some mysterious kidnappers, but they leave behind the Captain, Ivory Joyner, who is determined to take them back; in the meantime, her Second in Command, Nathaniel Shada, is making up a plan to get everyone back on the Oblivion. Will the two of them succeed?

Fight // Flight is a short interactive novel divided in 6 chapters, with two POVs.

name: Attack of the Mechadonk: The Ultimate Donkey
description: Old school side scrolling shoot'em up. Blast through exciting different locations. Defeating waves of defenders until the final boss battle. Attack of the Mechadonk is a indie game developed for fun and learning for the creator.

name: Ninja Hanrei
description: Ninja Hanrei is a 2D run and gun Platformer game inspired on Ancient Japan but with Super Powers.

name: Routine Racers
description: Crazy side-scrolling 3D game set in daily routines like escaping from work, buying at the supermarket, having a drink in a bar, stopping a fire or capturing some narcos. 10 Routine Levels and an extra Endless Mode with unique skills to master: dodge, jump, roll, engage, brake, turbo, build and push.

name: Cyberpunk SFX
description: What can be more spectacular than a girl armed with rockets and a sense of humor? Yes, she is about to start solving the problems of the 21st century. And if you want to make sure she doesn’t create a few new ones, you’ll have to show her the way.

name: Updive
description: Updive is a colorful obstacle course game with constant moving, dodging and timer mechanics. Explore 10 courses with different levels of difficulty and types of obstacles.

name: Tootinis
description: Tootins is an action packed puzzle adventure game in full 3D filled with original monsters, music and gameplay. Use your bubble spitting powers to smash or push monsters, solve puzzles and save your village. The gameplay is an original mix of action and puzzle elements.

name: Star Fox 64: Survival
description: Star Fox 64: Survival is a ROM hack/mod of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time, which changes the game to work as a roguelike Star Fox adventure, with Fox McCloud using a sword to battle enemies.

name: Khimera: Puzzle Island
description: Nonogram puzzle spin off of Khimera: Destroy All Monster Girls.

name: Hed the Pig
description: Help Hed in reaching the destination by avoiding all obstacles and skilfully maneuvering his body.

name: Trash Factory
description:
A mobile game where you sort trash into their correct bins. The trash flows via conveyor belts, and the player needs to direct the trash to the current bins by switching the direction in which the trash flows. Coins are used to purchase power-ups that can be used in-game to assist the player. 
 
The game progressively gets more difficult as time goes on. 
 
Players compete for high scores and in-game achievements.

name: ArcLand
description:
Arcland is a 2d platformer where you are a cave explorer who accidentally falls in a pit which leads to a big cave system. After some exploration, you find remains of an old civilization that used to live there, but they are long extinct, but the cave is still populated. 
 
Explore the cave and find secret rooms, chests, coins, and more treasure that is hidden deep into the cave.

name: Ponpu
description:
Get ready to break some eggs in this frantic multiplayer party-game! Ponpu mixes classic gameplay with new crazy mechanics, all packaged in one of the coolest art-styles ever seen!

Features:
- A fresh take on a classic game concept
- An epic campaign with massive bosses
- Hectic 4-player multiplayer with three game modes:

1. Deathmatch – Last Ponpu standing wins!
2. Coin Steal – Hoard the most coins before the time is up. Dragon style!
3. Paint Battle – Paint the town red! (or you know… whichever color you prefer)

- The most epic egg-based arsenal ever witnessed!

name: Ope
description: Ôpe is a 3D platforming game in which you play as a little hero named Bô. His quest will lead him through enchanted forest and temples where he’ll need to deliver shamans from corruption before the sun sets forever.

name: Of Ash and Dust
description: Of Ash and Dust is Dark Souls Remastered overhaul mod, that rebalances the game, adds new weapons and spells, restores cut content and much more.

name: The Fall and Rise of Sadcock-upon-Avon
description:
In the fiefdom of Sadcock-upon-Avon, strange things are happening. There are rumours of penises not looking or acting as they should...

Follow the witch Agnes Nutt as she magic-spells cursed phalluses back to health, saves or destroys marriages, shapeshifts, and more!

name: Super Gattai
description: Super Gattai is about ensuring that a city remains standing and continues to develop, even when it's constantly being destroyed by monsters that appear every Sunday, using the powerful Mekagears, giant robots made up of various parts that, when combined, create the city's defender!

name: Tebeo
description:
Tebeo is the creator's first ever SMW hack. They themed every level in it around comic books they like (Tebeo means comic in spanish).

The difficulty of this hack scales up a bit at the end of the game, and also at the last level of each overworld. Overall the game is easy/medium Kaizo difficulty.

All the mechanics and sprites are vanilla and almost all the graphics, except some stuff edited on yychr. It has custom palettes and music.

About asm, it has some life quality patches, like instant retry and NoMoreSpriteTileLimits.

name: Low Knight
description:
This game is a demake of and an homage to Hollow Knight, a game by Team Cherry. Made for the 2018 Demake Jam.
Explore an insect underworld, find the six charms and beat all the bosses.

name: Intergalactic Wizard Force
description: A twisted saturday morning cartoon adventure

name: Mimsy & Friends!
description: Bring your girlfriend a cake!

name: Last Embryo: Either of Brave to Story
description: The young girl "Sill", who longed to become an adventurer, came to the Developing City Aletia. However, shadows came quietly... No one had expected what kind of crisis Sill would encounter. But every footprint left by her will soon become mythology...

name: Hinge VR
description: Hinge VR is a psychological horror VR adventure. You suddenly find yourself in an abandoned skyscraper, deprived of all your senses and memories. The laws of physics are broken and time is collapsed. The only way to get out is to step into the frightening unknown putting all the pieces together.

name: Eugene's Dream: The Daily Ins And Outs Of A Sane Robot In An Insane World
description: Surreal and Weird, a game designed to hate the player. Featuring branch paths and plenty of funny events to playthrough such as platforming, shooting, bowling, horror, driving, mystery solving and more

name: Office Simulator
description: Try to turn a small garage start-up into a large company.

name: 英雄坛说X·归来
description: You can do what ever you want in this game.Such as learn some KongFu and kill the wanted bad guy.Help some old woman do her house work for money.Or even marry a pretty woman or handsome guy.This is an open KongFu world!Just do as yourself .Enjoy it!

name: Tabé-O-Ja
description: Tabé-O-Ja is a cooking action game where you take on the role of the young chef, Taberu Musashino, who must face off against a slurry of rival chefs in "The World's Strongest Dish" tournament by creating dishes that summon the food-based monsters, Tabegami: creatures that dwell within each dish concocted by the cooks ready to fight in the steads of their masters.

name: Black Castle
description: Black Castle is a action platformer for the Game Boy. It is inspired by "Castlevania" or "Fortress Of Fear". There are four levels to fight through and also four different weapons. All have their own pros and cons. At the end of each level there is a boss fight.

name: My Dream for the Future
description: A reflection on my life and dreams from the last 2 years. A personal project that took 2 years and a lot of life getting in the way to complete. During that time, I had almost no time for things like making games. This project is a hybrid between pixel landscapes and scenes I made back in the spring of 2019, and dialogue I wrote in the fall of 2020. Please explore, listen, and if you enjoy ramblings and reflection, you might have a good time.

name: The Shop of Good Memories
description: The Shop of Good Memories was made for advxjam based on the theme "a good time". Take a look around the shop, browse some memories, and leave one of your own if you like.

name: Isolation Story
description: Isolation Story is a game where you buy supplies, avoid people, and manage your SICKNESS using the new semi-useless GOV PHONE.

name: Duty First
description: Sin descripción

name: The Powerpuff Girls: Monkey Mania
description: Mojo Jojo has stolen the Powerpuff Girls' Chemical X and unleashed an army of manic monkeys and it's now your quest to save Townsville!

name: State.io
description:
Welcome to State .io, the epic strategy game that lets you conquer an alternative world! In this cell battle game, you'll command your troops to capture all the states while challenging your logic and reaction time.

State .io is an abstract real-time strategy game, a tactical clash of dots, and an exciting countries takeover. Fight against armies by solving strategic puzzles to beat your rivals and expand your superiority in the world arena. Lead your army to victory in this epic battle game and become a war strategy winner!

name: Yoshi Deja Vu DS
description: Yoshi Deja Vu DS is a medium-sized ROM hack of Super Mario 64 DS. This hack features 5 Main Courses and 5 Side Courses.

name: Donut Break: Head to Head
description: Donut Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated pastries tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect donut powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent.

name: Kevin's Path to Wizdom
description: You play as Kevin, the handsomest wizard in school — until your face gets stolen! Learn gesture-based spellcasting as you beat challenging enemies through mind boggling mazes in this turn-based tactics game. Can you catch the thief and save face?

name: Sengoku Rance: Limited Edition
description:
The limited edition comes with:
- Special Box Case
- 80 Page Manual Booklet
- Reversible DVD cover case
- Sengoku Rance game DVD
- Sengoku Rance OST CD
- Sengoku Rance Digital download card
- Kenshin Acrylic Keychain

name: Fear Is in the Mind
description: The mind plays tricks on you!

name: Knightmare
description: Use a unique chess-based move set to travel through the Dream Realm and prevent a mysterious amulet from falling into the wrong hands.

name: Coloring Pixels: Advent 2 Pack
description: This Advent 2 themed book unlocks 24 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Each image is based around the Holiday season! Play during the month of December to get the full Advent experience! 1 image will unlock every day between the 1st and the 24th like a true advent calendar!

name: Roscosmas Landing
description: Roscosmas Landing is a Space arcade game where you control a spaceship.

name: Waifu Love
description: Waifu Love is a casual puzzle game where you need to play puzzles like clicker, match game etc.

name: Royal Roads 2: The Magic Box
description: New adventures await you in the beautiful world of wizardry and magic!

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Ninja Delta
description: AboutYou finally find the treasure chest at the top of the mountain, so you begin to search all the mountains; Defeat the ninjas who track you and get the chest.FeatureThe DLC include full 10 missions

name: Don Flatus: Poop Hunter
description: After years of sending probes to Uranus, all the debris is now orbiting the planet as a ring of junk. The interplanetary commission has now sent a crack cleanup crew to clean the ring around Uranus. The team arrive at the planet and find that Uranus has been invaded by an alien presence!

name: Become a Gladiator VR
description: You start your struggle to survive in the Colosseum without knowing who you are and where slaughtering is just entertainment. In the middle of the Colosseum, all you can rely on is your weapons, shields and skills.

name: Hollow Destiny
description: A simple casual runner, set in a place after life and before death.

name: The Monster of Memory: Destiny
description: Winning the 8th Golden Manga Award in Taiwan, The Monster of Memory: Destiny has been adapted from the manga of the same name! Memory... Does it represent all a person has? Represented in the form of a visual novel, the ultimate in brotherly love...

name: Christmas Break Head to Head
description: Christmas Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive Xmas arcade environment. Unique animated Christmas items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Xmas Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect and stack powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Christmas levels to compete in and battle Mini Bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes

name: DreamWatcher
description: Play as The Agent in this fantasy 3D Metroidvania filled to the brim with surprising secrets, daring traversal, confounding puzzles and menacing monkeys.

name: Warp Drive
description:
WARP DRIVE is a fast-paced, arcade style racing game with a brand new way to drive: instantly TELEPORT around the track to find shortcuts and hidden routes! Take control of your QUAD ROTOR RACER, equip a Warp Module, and enter a series of high-speed tournaments to test your skills and creative driving abilities. Drive on the ceiling, jump huge canyons and race up waterfalls in an epic inverted racing battle!

Compete in a series of dynamically generated tournaments, with random options providing a different experience every time you play! UPGRADE your car between races, gradually adding more capabilities to DRIFT, BOOST, or WARP your way to victory. Follow the advice of your outspoken manager, Lenny, or just ignore whatever he says... what do aliens know about racing, anyway?!

WARP DRIVE: Race! Warp! Win!

name: Peryton University
description:
In Peryton University you play as Phim, a socially anxious and struggling to fit in freshman at Peryton University, and the dorm you are living in is hosting a house party in which you don’t know anyone. 
 
In Peryton University, Phim must take small steps towards tackling his social anxiety by interacting with people and collecting social cards to play when talking to other party goers. The goal is to collect all social cards and have the confidence to approach an estranged friend who is also attending the party.

name: From the Shadows
description: From the Shadows is a cooperative puzzle platformer game where players have to work their way through a mysterious mansion by resolving puzzles that revolve around the mechanics of light and shadow.

name: The Unexpected Quest
description: Adventure game with strategy and management elements in a medieval fantasy setting - drawing inspiration from classics such as Warcraft 3 and The Settlers. Embark on quests, hunt down treasures, and manage your resources as you build, battle, cast magic, and brew potions to bring order to the world.

name: New Scuffed Epic Bhop Simulator 2023 (Pog Champ)
description: Jump into it with New Scuffed Epic Bhop Simulator 2023 (Pog Champ), a new parkour game which has spicy memes, graphics, and physics engine! Play wth up to 5 friends in multiplayer and by yourself in single player!

name: Last Land
description:
Welcome to Valley Land. This Island Under Aabid. Aabid is a businessman. and the most powerful criminal man in India. The valley land is full of danger. and you have two options. first is you have to work under the Aabid. The second option is if you don't like to work under Aabid then be ready to save your ass. 
 
In this open world game, you play the role of Ajay, an undercover cop trying to take down the Aabid army. You'll have to prove yourself worthy as you fight your way up the organization, taking part in brutal criminal activities without blowing your cover.

name: The Wizard: WizHarder Edition
description: You are the most handsomest wizard of the academy. Except your face just got stolen. Use gesture-based spellcasting to make your way through monster-filled mazes and catch the mysterious thief in this turn-based Dungeon Puzzler.

name: Awakened: Dark Space
description: Awakened: Dark Space is an adventure indie game that's a unique fusion between medieval, present and sci-fi. Go on a search to find your friend Sara who went missing in a mysterious area called Crystal Woods which is rumored to be cursed for over 800 years, since a certain incident.

name: Hinge VR
description: Hinge is a VR horror that takes place in a nightmarish building filled with high-quality graphics and sound effects. The game creates an environment of suspense as you struggle for survival in an oppressive atmosphere of horror that chases you wherever you go. Every step is filled with fear, as the heart races in anticipation of the next ghoulish creature to face.

name: Strange Brigade: The Thrice Damned 3 - Great Pyramid of Bes
description:
A perilous pyramid full of terrifying traps? A troublesome teleporter to the afterlife? Old foes seeking revenge? Sounds like the climax to this terrifying tale will be anything but a walk in the park for our heroes! 
Grab a stiff drink, adventurer, the Great Pyramid of Bes is the thrilling finale to the Thrice Damned campaign. 
The legendary Shield of Bes may be complete and hordes of foes in the ground once more, but there's still work to be done! 
Finish the tantalising tale in this epic conclusion and blast your way to the finale solo or in 2-4 player co-op!

name: Brave Pinball
description: The world has been changed into pinball by the Demon King? A unique RPG-style pinball game has appeared!

name: Heidelberg 1693
description: Black magic in the age of pike and shot! Reload your musket after every blast in “Heidelberg 1693”, a challenging 2D action adventure set in a dark and twisted vision of Germany in the late 17th century.

name: Field Hospital: Dr. Taylor's Story
description: Field Hospital is a narrative-driven game about hard decisions. Decide who requires treatment the most. Use any available information: family status, criminal records or medical testing. Face consequences. Find clues and investigate the tangled case of Dr. Taylor.

name: Atari Lynx Collection 2
description:
Atari Lynx Collection 2 is the second compilation of Atari Lynx games for the Evercade. It contains 8 classic Atari Lynx games.

Games included:

California Games
Chips Challenge
Blue Lightning
Gates of Zendocon
Electrocop
Todd’s Adventure in Slimeland
Zarlor Mercenary
Checkered Flag

name: Atari Lynx Collection 1
description:
Atari Lynx Collection 1 is the first compilation of Atari Lynx games for the Evercade. It contains 17 classic Atari Lynx games.

Games included:
- Scrapyard Dog
- Basketbrawl
- Super Asteroids/Missile Command
- Awesome Golf
- Crystal Mines II: Buried Treasure
- CyberVirus
- Dracula the Undead
- Gordo 106
- Ishido: The Way of Stones
- Jimmy Connors Tennis
- Loopz
- Malibu Bikini Volleyball
- MegaPak
- Power Factor
- Remnant
- Super Skweek
- Xump

name: Strike Solitaire 3
description: Relax for your favorite game at the resorts of your dreams! Two games at once – bowling and solitaire! 120 new levels.

name: Checkers
description:
For all the fans of classic board games, we bring you Checkers!

Also known as "Draughts", the origins of checkers are so ancient that a board resembling this game was found back to 3000 BC in the city-state of "Ur" of the ancient Mesopotamia

You can play against Ai (artificial intelligence) or against family and friends!

Also, as bonus, Checkers has a selection of different boards and pieces to choose from, for a bit of customization. As always, you will be free to change the angles of your camera to get a better point of view during your matches.
Have Fun!

name: Camp Sunshine: Ultimate Edition
description: Dropped off at Summer Camp, Jez awakes in the middle of the night to discover blood everywhere. Camp Sunshine Ultimate Edition brings you the game, OST, and a wallpaper pack!

name: Let's Sing 2021: Asia
description: Sin descripción

name: Winter Resort Simulator Season 2: Content Pack
description: With the Season 2 - Content Pack of the Winter Resort Simulator, the winter wonderland is now even more extensive and offers more fun and variety with the many new vehicles and cable cars!

name: Salad Bar Tycoon: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Riddle Transfer 2: Legacy Edition
description: The too-long-anticipated conclusion to the story of Riddle Transfer.

name: Riddle Transfer: Legacy Edition
description: The unexpected continuation and second-to-last game in the series.

name: Riddle School 5: Legacy Edition
description: Riddle School 5: Legacy Edition is the last game of its series.

name: Riddle School 4: Legacy Edition
description: Phil Eggtree is now stuck in college. How will he escape this time?

name: Riddle School 3: Legacy Edition
description: The largest Riddle School yet; can you escape high school?

name: Riddle School 2: Legacy Edition
description: Phil escapes school again--middle school this time!

name: Riddle School: Legacy Edition
description: This is everyone's journey--to escape from school.

name: Battle Arena VR
description: Battle Arena VR is a multiplayer arena shooter, where you are automatically matched with opponents. Challenge yourself, challenge everyone in a deathmatch Battle Arena!

name: Little Gods of the Abyss
description: Go on a trip to heal the mysterious and beautiful world of the soul. Visit various stages that express the complex emotions of the Soul World. Open closed doors to heal broken hearts and experience beautiful stories.

name: Star Renegades: Enter the Dragoon
description: A new Renegade, additional difficulties, stats & more in this free content update!

name: Train Sim World 2: CSX C40-8W Loco
description: As created for Train Sim World 2, the General Electric C40-8W is richly detailed and features realistic controls and operating performance. The powerful locomotive wears CSX's attractive YN2 livery and is authentically suited for duty on Sand Patch Grade.

name: Train Sim World 2: BR Heavy Freight Pack Loco
description: This bumper double-loco pack brings iconic and historic heavy freight operations to the Northern Trans-Pennine route. Experience a bygone era of freight haulage as you move thousands of tons of fuel and goods over the challenging Trans-Pennine grades.

name: Blind_
description: This game is a grid-based puzzle with a twist: The layout of each level is hidden from you at the start of every room. 60 levels filled with various puzzles. Make determinations on your surroundings, project your moves, utilize mechanics of teleportation, wraparounds and more!

name: Train Sim World 2: CSX C40-8W
description: As created for Train Sim World 2, the versatile CSX C40-8W is richly detailed and features realistic controls and operating performance. The powerful locomotive wears CSX's attractive YN2 livery and is authentically suited for duty on Sand Patch Grade.

name: Tokyo Love +
description: A romance/drama visual novel. School life, love, jealousy, betrayals...and YANDARE!(different endings). Available in Chinese, French and English.

name: RedEx
description: RedEx is a 2D shooter with Tower Defence mechanics, with a minimalist pixel art stile. You are to fight against mercenaries of underground smuggling organization which pretends to be a logistic corporation called RedExpress.

name: Colored Shapes
description: Use physics to solve puzzles. Control gravity to move the main character on a dangerous adventure.

name: Biscuitts 3
description: Adventure in a strange world, filled with monsters. Take your magic wand and combat in a fun adventure.

name: Troy: The Malware Fight
description: One day Troy unexpectedly detects a malware on his computer. This is where the great fight against the malware starts. After cleaning his computer Troy realizes that malware has spread all over his computer gadgets.

name: Chunithm Super Star
description: A South Eastern Asia (international) entry in the chunithm series. It borrows graphic assets from Chunithm Star, contains songs and engine from Chunithm Crystal and has unique events and story.

name: ParaMonsters and the Haunted Escape Room
description: ParaMonsters is an adventure/visual novel about tiny monsters investigating a paranormal rumor at an escape room in town.

name: Castle of the Land
description: A castle is under attack, a group of adventurers in town decide to help defend it to the last man.

name: Police X Heroine Lovepatrina! Love na Rhythm de Taiho Shimasu!
description: Love na Rhythm de Taiho Shimasu! is a rhythm game based on the Police × Heroine Lovepatrina! tokusatsu TV series. Players control the Lovepatrina group by holding the Joy-Con in both hands and shaking them to the rhythm! Five difficulty settings are included so all levels of players can play!

name: Masters of Puzzle: Autumn Fuji
description: A photography puzzle box for the Masters of Puzzle game.

name: Bragger's Run
description: A Procedurally Generated Rogue-Lite Action Game: Bragger's Run takes you on a death race across a hostile continent where you'll collect treasures and trophies from your kills. Play as the Gunslinger, the Duelist, or the Wizard and see if you have what it takes. Can you make The Run?

name: Movie Tycoon Simulator 2020
description: Manage movie theatres and make your very own Hollywood Pictures!

name: Brother Wake Up
description: Help your little brother get rid of the "Clockmaker's" curse.

name: Mouse Painting Master
description: This story originated from a painter friend of mine.

name: The Queen TV-Game 2
description: You've already switched. It's too late. Love Hero is removed from channel 2600. A lonely King is without a Queen. A physical XN update with new data slowly faded the King's SD3 memory. His only memory with the Queen was watching Love Hero on TV. The Queen's soul calls to him shouting their first encounter. The King finds out his Queen has been trapped out permanently from data transfer. He locates the Queen and sets out on one final journey! A journey he will not win.

name: Arcade Archives: Rush'n Attack
description: Rush'n Attack is an action game released by Konami in 1985. Infiltrate an enemy base and get past four obstacles to rescue your comrades! Take out foes with a knife, or with weapons dropped from enemies. Jump and duck to avoid attacks and make it to the goal. The honor of the Green Berets depends on you!

name: Tiny World Racing
description: Hit the asphalt and leave your opponents in the dust in this top-down mini racing game! Blast your way through a variety of environments in 40 tracks across 10 different tournaments. From crumbling castles to volcanic islands, you'll need to master all kinds of terrain to become the world's best racer.

name: Zoids Wild: Infinity Blast
description: Zoids Wild: Infinity Blast is a Zoids game released for the Nintendo Switch. Gameplay is similar to Zoids Wild: Blast Unleashed, with newer Zoids and custom parts, including Zoids unrelated to the Zoids: Wild anime.

name: Our Church and Halloween: Story Two
description: Sin descripción

name: Orb Runner
description: Orb Runner is a 3-D plat-former where your goal is to speed run your way through levels while also collecting as many orbs as possible before time runs out!

name: Dawn of the Mexica
description: Dawn of the Mexica is a turn-based roguelike that blends accurate history and mythical fantasy. It features complex combat mechanics, tactics and skills, yet also brings you an easy to use interface. Fight your way through the procedurally generated scenarios and stop the fall of the Fifth Sun!

name: Street Fighter: Duel
description:
Enter the world of Street Fighter like never before with the first mobile RPG game of the franchise - Street Fighter: Duel!

Street Fighter: Duel is the official Street Fighter RPG mobile game for the casual Street Fighter fan, where you can collect and upgrade a team of recognizable fighters and ​battle your way through an original story or against friends and powerful opponents around the world.

name: Dangerous Shelter
description:
The third game in LucyDream's zombie survival dating sim series, set ten years after the events of 'Dangerous Fellows'. Unlike previous LucyDream games, 'Dangerous Shelter' is a stat-raising simulator with over twenty different endings.

The story follows a girl named Zoey (the younger sister of Havenless's protagonist) getting saved during a zombie apocalypse and brought to a shelter where she has 180 days to prove her usefulness or risk getting kicked out.

name: Azarashi Dentetsu
description:
You are a rookie seal driver working in Antarctica.
Tilt the Joy-Con to steer the train in this new kind of electric train action!
The lives of these chubby seals are being threatened by a vicious killer whale!
The seals are being hunted by a vicious killer whale, and you'll have to steer the train to keep them from falling into the sea.
Drive them safely to the station and keep them from falling into the sea. Now, let's go!

name: Picross S5
description: The fifth installment in Jupiter Corporation's Picross S series for the Switch.

name: Winter Resort Simulator Season 2
description: A simulator where you can run a ski resort and do everything from grooming slopes to feeding the cable cars. There is now a multiplayer and other new cable cars with original controls. The Funitel is the big new cable car and there are also the new Omega IV gondolas.

name: QV
description:
Start a dimension-jumping adventure with Quby! In a universe, dimensions are connected to each other. In the center of the passages lies Dimensional Core, keeping the balance between dimensions.

This balance began to collapse when the Core stopped working. Unless someone gives a helping hand, soon the universe will follow. The Gate doesn't let anyone into the Dimensional Core. But Quby, as the last descendant of Chosen Ones, can access the Gate. To restore the balance between dimensions, Quby opens a portal to the Gate.

With Varon, the talking penguin, she must explore the long-forgotten ruins of her ancestors and find a way to reactivate the Core.
Let the journey begin!

name: Spirit of the North: Enhanced Edition
description: Spirit of the North: Enhanced Edition is a single-player third-person adventure game inspired by the breathtaking and mysterious landscapes of Iceland. The story takes root from various pieces of Nordic folklore. Play as an ordinary fox whose story becomes entwined with The Guardian of the Northern Lights, a magical spirit fox. As you journey over the mountains and under red-stained skies, you’ll discover more about your companion and a land left in ruin. Uniquely designed to purposefully have no dialogue or narration. Players must breathe in their surroundings to solve various puzzles and speculate the meaning of a lost ancient civilization.

name: Koi Suru Otome to Shugo no Tate: Re:boot the "Shield-9"
description: Koi Suru Otome to Shugo no Tate – Re:boot The “SHIELD-9” is a remake of the 2007-released Koi Suru Otome to Shugo no Tate – The Code Name is “Shield 9” that adds new routes for characters Yuuri Homura and Setsuko Sanada with support for high-definition graphics.

name: Last Labyrinth: Collector's Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Last Labyrinth
- Special Packaging
- Theme Song Maxi Single CD
- Original Story Book
- Original Post Card
- Original Sticker

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythmic Adventure Pack
description:
Taiko no Tatsujin RPG?! Join Don-chan in two exciting RPG adventures!

From the past to the future, Don-chan sets out on a great adventure that will transcend time and space and save the world from mysterious occurrences around the world in "Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythmic Adventure Pack".

name: Shredded Secrets
description: Shredded Secrets is a story-based platformer that lets you step into the lives of four people at a middle school - Isabella, Taylor, London and Oakley.

name: Let's Cook Together
description:
2 cooks, 1 goal

Some games, just like food, are way more enjoyable when shared with someone else. So get 1 yourself, add 1 partner, mix it well with flying food and a pinch of challenge powder, and there you have it – Let’s Cook Together, a bonding couch co-op experience for 2 players!

name: Puck Buddies
description: Puck Buddies is a bouncy multiplayer sports game that combines the best elements of hockey and minigolf into non-stop fun. Challenge your friends to pass, shoot, spin and bump into things in this chirpily competitive deflection derby. It's time to bounce!

name: Axe Cop
description: Fight all of the bad guys! Axe Cop and his team of colorful characters must go on an epic adventure, that covers his ten-year comic book history, to rid the world of all bad guys once and for all!

name: Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society
description:
From the creators of Labyrinth of Refrain: Coven of Dusk comes a new chapter in the dungeon-exploring adventure filled with charm and mystery! Summoned by the magnificent Madame Marta, you are but a wandering spirit awaiting your next command. With the help of Eureka, Madame Marta’s assistant, and an army of soul-infused puppets, you are tasked with delving into the depths of a mysterious underground labyrinth teeming with enchanted monsters to unearth the Curios d'art that lie within!

Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society offers dungeon-crawling adventures with new quality of life improvements and 50 hours of exploration alongside a cast of fully customizable companions to do your bidding. Use a variety of pacts and puppet soldiers to customize a team of up to 40 fighters to dive into the darkness and discover the secrets with the Labyrinth of Galleria…if you dare!

name: Don't Be Afraid
description: Don't Be Afraid is an adventure horror that allows you to become a boy kidnapped by a psycho. Exploring the giant house of your torturer you will soon discover many things worse than your childish nightmares…

name: The Beardless Wizard
